title: FileNotFound Metadata Save Issue During Training Dataset Creation
body:
Hi,

I hope this is not a redundant issue; I searched the repo and could not find a solution to this issue.

When attempting to create a training dataset before training the model, the following error pops up in the terminal:

Running an maDLC project using DLC version 2.1.10.4 on Windows 10. If the config or any other project files would help with diagnosing the issue, please let me know and I am happy to share them ðŸ˜„
